title: Delivered: Real Men and Women Who Turned From Porn to Purity
description:
Matt Fradd - Delivered: True Stories of Men and Women Who Turned From Porn to Purity (EPUB, MOBI)


Deliverance from pornography is possibleÃ¢â‚¬â€and these true stories prove it.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The pious Catholic man whose fairytale marriage was almost destroyed by 
   his fierce addictionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The young woman who escaped a broken and abusive childhood only to become 
   ensnared in pornÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s seamy underworldÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The couple who tried everything to beat the pain and shame of porn 
   in their homeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The female musician who thought porn was a guy thing until she got 
   hooked herselfÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ã¢â‚¬Â¦and five other inspiring tales of liberation from the ravages of pornography.

Delivered is proof that no one is beyond the reach of GodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s healing grace.


"Matt Fradd's Delivered fills a need within the Church like no other work has done before. Pornography is an issue that doesn't impact only teens or males. It's a scourge that has wounded virtually all familiesÃ¢â‚¬â€and society as a whole. Through a collection of powerful testimonies, this book not only reveals why pornography is so damaging, but shows how the vice can be overcome and the damage undone." - Jason Evert, The Chastity Project

"These accounts of people redeemed from the pornography plague fills us with a hopeful urgency to share the good news that freedom is possible. Matt Fradd does us a great service gathering their powerful stories of hope and redemption." -Damon C. Owens, executive director, Theology of the Body Institute

"Matt is taking on a topic that is destroying society, pornography. It's not enough to tell people to avoid pornography, they need a vision of life that exposes pornography for what it is, false adoration. Matt does a great job of this." - Jeff Cavins, Creator of the Great Adventure Bible Study
